template.template: Template App Mesos Agent via HTTP
template.name: Template App Mesos Agent via HTTP
template.description: This template works out of the box as soon as Mesos Observability Metrics is available inside your cluster; it does not require any Zabbix agent installation or configuration. It allows external monitoring of the Mesos agents through the metrics HTTP endpoint. https://mesos.apache.org/documentation/latest/monitoring/

item.name: Mesos agent: Containerizer fetcher cache size total
item.description: The configured maximum size of the fetcher cache in bytes. This value is constant for the life of the Mesos agent.

item.name: Mesos agent: Containerizer fetcher cache size used
item.description: The current amount of data stored in the fetcher cache in bytes.

item.name: Mesos agent: Task fetches failed
item.description: Number of times per second the Mesos fetcher failed to fetch all the URIs for a task.

item.name: Mesos agent: Task fetches succeeded
item.description: Number of times per second the Mesos fetcher successfully fetched all the URIs for a task.

item.name: Mesos agent: Containers destroyed due to launch errors
item.description: Number of containers destroyed due to launch errors

item.name: Mesos agent: Garbage collector removals failed
item.description: Number of times per second the agent garbage collection process has failed to remove a sandbox path.

item.name: Mesos agent: Garbage collector removals pending
item.description: Number of sandbox paths that are currently pending agent garbage collection.

item.name: Mesos agent: Garbage collector removals succeeded
item.description: Number of sandbox paths per second the agent successfully removed.

item.name: Mesos agent: Containers launch errors per second
item.description: Number of container launch errors per second

item.name: Mesos agent: % CPUs allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated CPUs

trigger.name: Mesos agent: CPU allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_CPUS_CRIT} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}
Mesos agent: CPU allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_CPUS_WARN} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

dependency.name: Mesos agent: CPU allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_CPUS_CRIT} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: Mesos agent: CPU allocation is below {$MESOS_AGENT_CPUS_MIN} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

item.name: Mesos agent: % revocable CPUs allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable CPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable CPUs total
item.description: Number of revocable CPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable CPUs allocated
item.description: Number of allocated revocable CPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: CPUs total
item.description: Number of CPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: % disk allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated disk space

trigger.name: Mesos agent: Disk allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_DISK_CRIT} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}
Mesos agent: Disk allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_DISK_WARN} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

dependency.name: Mesos agent: Disk allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_DISK_CRIT} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

item.name: Mesos agent: % revocable disk allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable disk space

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable Disk space total
item.description: Revocable disk space

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable Disk space allocated
item.description: Allocated revocable disk space

item.name: Mesos agent: Disk space total
item.description: Disk space

item.name: Mesos agent: Disk space allocated
item.description: Allocated disk space

item.name: Mesos agent: Executors preempted per second
item.description: Number of executors destroyed due to preemption per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Executors registering
item.description: Number of executors registering

item.name: Mesos agent: Executors running
item.description: Number of executors running

item.name: Mesos agent: Executors terminated per second
item.description: Number of terminated executors per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Executors terminating
item.description: Number of terminating executors

item.name: Mesos agent: Executor max allowed age
item.description: Maximum allowed age in seconds to delete executor directory

item.name: Mesos agent: Frameworks active
item.description: Number of active frameworks

item.name: Mesos agent: % GPUs allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated GPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: % revocable GPUs allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable GPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable GPUs total
item.description: Number of revocable GPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable GPUs allocated
item.description: Number of allocated revocable GPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: GPUs total
item.description: Number of GPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: GPUs used
item.description: Number of allocated GPUs

item.name: Mesos agent: Invalid framework messages
item.description: Number of invalid framework messages per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Invalid status updates
item.description: Number of invalid status updates

item.name: Mesos agent: % memory allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated memory

trigger.name: Mesos agent: Memory allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_MEMORY_CRIT} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}
Mesos agent: Memory allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_MEMORY_WARN} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

dependency.name: Mesos agent: Memory allocation is above {$MESOS_AGENT_MEMORY_CRIT} for {$MESOS_AGENT_METRICS_TOLERANCE} on {HOST.NAME}

item.name: Mesos agent: % revocable memory allocated
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable memory

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable Memory total
item.description: Memory revocable total

item.name: Mesos agent: revocable Memory allocated
item.description: Allocated revocable memory

item.name: Mesos agent: Memory total
item.description: Memory total

item.name: Mesos agent: Memory allocated
item.description: Allocated memory

item.name: Mesos agent: Recovery errors
item.description: Number of errors encountered during agent recovery

item.name: Mesos agent: Recovery time
item.description: Agent recovery time in seconds. This value is only available after agent recovery succeeded and remains constant for the life of the Mesos agent.

item.name: Mesos agent: Registration status
item.description: Whether this agent is registered with a master

trigger.expression: last(/Template App Mesos Agent via HTTP/mesos.master[slave/registered])=0
trigger.name: Mesos agent on {HOST.NAME} has not registered with the cluster

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks failed per second
item.description: Number of failed tasks per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks finished per second
item.description: Number of finished tasks per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks killed per second
item.description: Number of killed tasks per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks lost per second
item.description: Number of lost tasks per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks running
item.description: Number of running tasks

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks staging
item.description: Number of staging tasks

item.name: Mesos agent: Tasks starting
item.description: Number of starting tasks

item.name: Mesos agent: Uptime
item.description: Uptime in seconds

item.name: Mesos agent: Valid framework messages
item.description: Number of valid framework messages per second

item.name: Mesos agent: Valid status updates
item.description: Number of valid status updates

item.name: System: CPUs total
item.description: Number of CPUs available

item.name: System: Load average 1min
item.description: Load average for the past 1 minutes

item.name: System: Load average 5min
item.description: Load average for the past 5 minutes

item.name: System: Load average 15min
item.description: Load average for the past 15 minutes

item.name: System: Memory free
item.description: Free memory

item.name: System: Memory total
item.description: Total memory

item.name: Mesos agent: Volume GIDs free
item.description: Number of free gids available for volume gid manager

item.name: Mesos agent: Volume GIDs total
item.description: Number of gids configured for volume gid manager

macro.description: Warning threshold for mesos agent CPUs allocation
Warning threshold for mesos agent disk allocation
Warning threshold for mesos agent memory allocation

template.template: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
template.name: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
template.description: This template works out of the box as soon as Mesos Observability Metrics is available inside your cluster; it does not require any Zabbix agent installation or configuration. It allows external monitoring of the Mesos cluster through the metrics HTTP endpoint. https://mesos.apache.org/documentation/latest/monitoring/

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation runs per second
item.description: Number of times the allocation algorithm has run per second

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms count
item.description: Number of allocation batch latency measurements in the window

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms max
item.description: Maximum allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms min
item.description: Minimum allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms p50
item.description: Median allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms p90
item.description: 90th percentile allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms p95
item.description: 95th percentile allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms p99
item.description: 99th percentile allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms p999
item.description: 99.9th percentile allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms p9999
item.description: 99.99th percentile allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run latency ms
item.description: Allocation batch latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms count
item.description: Number of allocation algorithm time measurements in the window

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms max
item.description: Maximum time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms min
item.description: Minimum time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms p50
item.description: Median time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms p90
item.description: 90th percentile of time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms p95
item.description: 95th percentile of time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms p99
item.description: 99th percentile of time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms p999
item.description: 99.9th percentile of time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms p9999
item.description: 99.99th percentile of time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos allocation run ms
item.description: Time spent in allocation algorithm in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator event queue dispatches
item.description: Number of dispatch events in the event queue

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos CPUs offered or allocated
item.description: Number of CPUs offered or allocated

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos CPUs total
item.description: Number of CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos resources disk offered or allocated
item.description: Allocated or offered disk space

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos resources disk total
item.description: Total disk space

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos memory offered or allocated
item.description: Allocated or offered memory

item.name: Mesos master: Allocator mesos resources memory total
item.description: Total memory

item.name: Mesos master: CPUs percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: CPUs revocable percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: CPUs revocable total
item.description: Number of revocable CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: CPUs revocable used
item.description: Number of allocated revocable CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: CPUs total
item.description: Number of CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: CPUs used
item.description: Number of allocated CPUs

item.name: Mesos master: Disk percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated disk space

item.name: Mesos master: Disk revocable percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable disk space

item.description: Allocated revocable disk space

item.name: Mesos master: Disk total
item.description: Disk space

item.name: Mesos master: Disk used
item.description: Allocated disk space

item.name: Mesos master: Messages dropped
item.description: Number of dropped messages

item.name: Mesos master: Role
item.description: Whether this is the elected master

item.name: Mesos master: Event queue dispatches
item.description: Number of messages in the event queue

item.name: Mesos master: Event queue messages
item.description: Number of dispatches in the event queue

item.name: Mesos master: Frameworks active
item.description: Number of active frameworks

item.name: Mesos master: Frameworks connected
item.description: Number of connected frameworks

item.name: Mesos master: Frameworks disconnected
item.description: Number of disconnected frameworks

item.description: Number of inactive frameworks

item.name: Mesos master: GPUs percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated GPUs

item.name: Mesos master: GPUs revocable percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable GPUs

item.name: Mesos master: GPUs revocable total
item.description: Number of revocable GPUs

item.name: Mesos master: GPUs revocable used
item.description: Number of allocated revocable GPUs

item.name: Mesos master: GPUs total
item.description: Number of GPUs

item.name: Mesos master: GPUs used
item.description: Number of allocated GPUs

item.name: Mesos master: Invalid executor to framework messages
item.description: Number of invalid executor to framework messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Invalid framework to executor messages
item.description: Number of invalid framework to executor messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Invalid status updates
item.description: Number of invalid status updates per second

item.name: Mesos master: Invalid status update acknowledgements
item.description: Number of invalid operation status update acknowledgements per second

item.name: Mesos master: Memory percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated memory

item.name: Mesos master: Memory revocable percent
item.description: Percentage of allocated revocable memory

item.name: Mesos master: Memory revocable total
item.description: Revocable memory

item.name: Mesos master: Memory revocable used
item.description: Allocated revocable memory

item.name: Mesos master: Memory total
item.description: Memory

item.name: Mesos master: Memory used
item.description: Allocated memory

item.name: Mesos master: Messages authenticate
item.description: Number of authentication messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages deactivate framework
item.description: Number of framework deactivation messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages decline offers
item.description: Number of offers declined per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages executor to framework
item.description: Number of executor to framework messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages exited executor
item.description: Number of terminated executor messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages framework to executor
item.description: Number of messages from a framework to an executor per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages kill task
item.description: Number of kill task messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages launch tasks
item.description: Number of launch task messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages operation status update acknowledgement
item.description: Number of launch task messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages reconcile tasks
item.description: Number of reconcile task messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages register framework
item.description: Number of framework registration messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages register slave
item.description: Number of agent registration messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages re-register framework
item.description: Number of framework re-registration messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages re-register slave
item.description: Number of agent re-registration messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages resource request
item.description: Number of resource request messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages revive offers
item.description: Number of offer revival messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages status update
item.description: Number of status update messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages status update acknowledgement
item.description: Number of status update acknowledgement messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages unregister framework
item.description: Number of framework unregistration messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages unregister slave
item.description: Number of agent unregistration messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Messages update slave
item.description: Number of update agent messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Outstanding offers
item.description: Number of outstanding resource offers

item.name: Mesos master: Recovery slave removals
item.description: Number of agents not reregistered during master failover per second

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves active
item.description: Number of active agents

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves connected
item.description: Number of connected agents

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves disconnected
item.description: Number of disconnected agents

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves inactive
item.description: Number of inactive agents

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves unreachable
item.description: Number of unreachable agents per second. Unreachable agents are periodically garbage collected from the registry, which will cause this value to decrease.

item.name: Mesos master: Slave registrations
item.description: Number of agents per second that were able to cleanly re-join the cluster and connect back to the master after the master is disconnected.

item.name: Mesos master: Slave removals reason registered
item.description: Number of agents removed when new agents registered at the same address per second

item.name: Mesos master: Slave removals reason unhealthy
item.description: Number of agents failed due to failed health checks per second

item.name: Mesos master: Slave removals reason unregistered
item.description: Number of agents unregistered per second

item.name: Mesos master: Slave removals
item.description: Number of agent per second removed for various reasons, including maintenance

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves re-registrations
item.description: Number of agent re-registrations per second

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves unreachable cancelled
item.description: Number of times per second that an agent was due to be marked unreachable but this transition was cancelled. This happens when the agent removal rate limit is enabled and the agent sends a PONG response message to the master before the rate limit allows the agent to be marked unreachable.

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves unreachable completed
item.description: Number of agents per second that were marked as unreachable because they failed health checks. These are agents which were not heard from despite the agent-removal rate limit, and have been marked as unreachable in the master's agent registry.

item.name: Mesos master: Slaves unreachable scheduled
item.description: Number of agents per second which have failed their health check and are scheduled to be marked unreachable. They will not be marked unreachable immediately due to the Agent Removal Rate-Limit, but master/slave_unreachable_completed will start increasing as they do get removed.

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks error
item.description: Number of tasks per second that were invalid

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks failed
item.description: Number of failed tasks per second

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks finished
item.description: Number of finished tasks per second

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks gone by operator
Mesos master: Tasks killed
item.description: Number of killed tasks

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks killing
item.description: Number of tasks currently being killed

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks lost
item.description: Number of lost tasks per second

trigger.name: Tasks in the cluster are disappearing
trigger.description: Tasks in the cluster are disappearing. Possible causes include hardware failures, bugs in one of the frameworks, or bugs in Mesos.

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks running
item.description: Number of running tasks

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks staging
item.description: Number of staging tasks

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks starting
item.description: Number of starting tasks

item.name: Mesos master: Tasks unreachable
item.description: Number of unreachable tasks

item.name: Mesos master: Task lost source master reason slave removed
Mesos master: Uptime
item.description: Uptime in seconds

trigger.name: The cluster has a flapping master node

item.name: Mesos master: Valid executor to framework messages
item.description: Number of valid executor to framework messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Valid framework to executor messages
item.description: Number of valid framework to executor messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Valid status updates
item.description: Number of valid status update messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Valid status update acknowledgements
item.description: Number of valid status update acknowledgement messages per second

item.name: Mesos master: Event queue HTTP requests
item.description: Number of HTTP requests in the event queue

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar log ensemble size
item.description: The number of masters in the ensemble (cluster) that the current master communicates with (including itself) to form the replicated log quorum. It's imperative that this number is always less than `--quorum * 2` to prevent split-brain. It's also important that it should be greater than or equal to `--quorum` to maintain availability.

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar log recovered
item.description: Whether the replicated log for the registrar has caught up with the other masters in the cluster. A cluster is operational as long as a quorum of "recovered" masters is available in the cluster.

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state fetch ms
item.description: Registry read latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms max
item.description: Maximum registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms min
item.description: Minimum registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms p50
item.description: Median registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms p90
item.description: 90th percentile registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms p95
item.description: 95th percentile registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms p99
item.description: 99th percentile registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms p999
item.description: 99.9th percentile registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms p9999
item.description: 99.99th percentile registry write latency in ms

item.name: Mesos master: Registrar state store ms
item.description: Registry write latency in ms

item.name: System: CPUs total
item.description: Number of CPUs available in this master node

item.name: System: load average 1min
item.description: Load average for the past minute

item.name: System: load average 5min
item.description: Load average for the past 5 minutes

item.name: System: load average 15min
item.description: Load average for the past 15 minutes

item.name: System: Memory free
item.description: Free memory in bytes

item.name: System: Memory total bytes
item.description: Total memory in bytes

macro.description: Maximal tolerated load on the CPUs
Warning threshold for load on the CPUs
Maximal tolerated load on the memory
Warning threshold for load on the memory
Minimal tolerated number of Mesos agents
Warning threshold for number of Mesos agents

value.host: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
value.name: Allocation run, ms

value.host: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
value.name: Allocation run latency, ms

value.host: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
value.name: Mesos cluster CPU usage

value.host: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
value.name: Mesos cluster memory usage

value.host: Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
Template App Mesos Master via HTTP
value.name: Mesos cluster disk usage

trigger.expression: min(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/cpus_percent],600)>{$MESOS_CPUS_PERCENT_CRIT} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
trigger.name: Cluster CPUs utilization is above {$MESOS_CPUS_PERCENT_CRIT}%
trigger.description: Cluster CPU utilization is at capacity. Consider scaling the cluster out.

trigger.expression: min(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/cpus_percent],600)>{$MESOS_CPUS_PERCENT_WARN} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
trigger.name: Cluster CPUs utilization is above {$MESOS_CPUS_PERCENT_WARN}%
trigger.description: Cluster CPU utilization is close to capacity.

dependency.name: Cluster CPUs utilization is above {$MESOS_CPUS_PERCENT_CRIT}%
dependency.expression: min(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/cpus_percent],600)>{$MESOS_CPUS_PERCENT_CRIT} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1

trigger.expression: min(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/mem_percent],600)>{$MESOS_MEMORY_PERCENT_CRIT} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
trigger.name: Cluster memory utilization is above {$MESOS_MEMORY_PERCENT_CRIT}%

trigger.expression: min(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/mem_percent],600)>{$MESOS_MEMORY_PERCENT_WARN} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
trigger.name: Cluster memory utilization is above {$MESOS_MEMORY_PERCENT_WARN}%
trigger.description: Cluster memory utilization is close to capacity.

dependency.name: Cluster memory utilization is above {$MESOS_MEMORY_PERCENT_CRIT}%
dependency.expression: min(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/mem_percent],600)>{$MESOS_MEMORY_PERCENT_CRIT} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1

trigger.expression: last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/slaves_active])<{$MESOS_MIN_SLAVES_CRIT} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
trigger.name: Number of Mesos agents are critically low
trigger.description: Agents are having trouble connecting to the master.

trigger.expression: last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/slaves_active])<{$MESOS_MIN_SLAVES_WARN} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
trigger.name: Number of Mesos agents are low
trigger.description: Agents are having trouble connecting to the master.

dependency.name: Number of Mesos agents are critically low
dependency.expression: last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/slaves_active])<{$MESOS_MIN_SLAVES_CRIT} and last(/Template App Mesos Master via HTTP/mesos.master[master/elected])=1
